fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose a player to cut down, attacking them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you kill an evil (or framed as evil) player, you must attack another player immediately. This must repeat until you kill an innocent player.
- Once you kill an innocent player, you lose your axe.

fields.name: Background:
fields.value: - At night, choose two players to deal a basic attack to. If one of your targets is innocent and one of your targets is evil (even framed), you will only attack the innocent one. Otherwise, you attack both. You die immediately if you kill an innocent player. One use.
